doc:
Sam Whipple https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Whipple 0 Sampson E. "Sam" Whipple (September 25, 1960 – June 3, 2002) was an American actor best remembered for his role as Dr. John Ballard on the TV series Seven Days. His credits include The Doors, Airheads, This Is Spinal Tap and The Rock. He also appeared in television shows such as Open All Night, The Larry Sanders Show, Seinfeld, and Home Improvement. On June 3, 2002, Whipple died at age 41 after a two-year battle with cancer. Sampson_E._"_Sam_"_Whipple ( September_25_,_1960 – June_3_,_2002 ) was an_American_actor_best remembered for his_role as Dr._John_Ballard on the_TV_series Seven_Days . His_credits include The_Doors , Airheads , This Is Spinal_Tap and The_Rock . He also appeared in television_shows such_as Open_All_Night , The_Larry_Sanders_Show , Seinfeld , and Home_Improvement . On June_3_,_2002 , Whipple died at age_41 after a_two-year_battle with cancer .
